descriptionHtml:
IT WILL NOT BE UPDATED BEACUSE IM WORKING ON ANOTHER MOD!!!!


PLEASE ENDORSE <3
THE HOUSE IS IN RIVERWOOD NEAR THE SAWMILL

THE HOUSE CONTAINS:

-4 Merchants
-1 Bed
-1 Chest

THE CELLAR CONTAINS:

-1 Blacksmith/merchant
-3 random npc\'s
-3 Weapon plaque
-2 Shield/greatsword plaque
-5 Weapon rack
-5 Mannequin
-grindstone
-workbench
-smelter
-tanning rack
-forge

OUTSIDE CONTAINS

-A big stable
-Alchemy Lab
-Archane Enchanter
-2 Bed roll
-Coocking place
-Wood Chopping Block
-A very good follower there goes every where with you

THE MINE CONTAIS:

-A big mine with many ebony ore

Thanks in advance

HOW TO INSTALL! :

With mod manager
download it with mod manager -> activate it -> go datafiles in laucher and activate it 

Witout mod manager 
download it manual -> extract the Dragonbornscrib.esp to data folder (located in the skyrim main folder) -> go data files in launcher and activate it

Good luck ;)
author: TobiasBerry
